attributes.action: Include a "NONE OF THE ABOVE" option on all elections
attributes.additional_details: Because the current system is corrupted by corporate interference and influence at a global level with unelected people in non governmental organisations deciding how we should all live, and its time this ended permanently
attributes.background: In this event. government must dissolve parliament and hand over running of the country to the civil service.a referendum must be held to allow the people to select a new form of governance, preferably a citizens assembly selected by a similar process to jury service, without party politics

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions that make false or unproven claims. This includes unsubstantiated claims of corruption and undue interference and influence in British politics.

It is also not clear in what event you want a referendum to be held on changes to governance arrangements, and what the public would be asked in a referendum. Your petition refers to adding a "None of the above" option to all elections, but it's not clear if you want a majority voting for none of the above in a local election in a particular area to result in the dissolution of Parliament. In the case of a general election, Parliament is already dissolved, and does not sit again until a date set by royal proclamation.
